title: Democracy in action: citizen's welfare, citizen's job
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Germany - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Local government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public administration
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Citizen participation
description: A close look at the manifold tasks of the elected shire and town councillors in Germany. We see them at meetings, seeking progress and prosperity for their citizens. By encouraging and helping establish new local industries on a community basis, there is resultant increase in population, housing, hospitals, and amenities. Such progress is soundly based and assured.
